sense.def:
Fun
je prijetna, razveseljiva in brezskrbna dejavnost ali zabava.

To have fun
pomeni zabavati se.

seg.quote: She wanted a bit more fun out of life.

sense.def:
Kdor je
fun
, je dober za družbo, ker je zanimiv ali zabaven.

seg.quote: He was fun to be with.

sense.def:
Kdor nekaj naredi
for fun
ali
for the fun of it
, to naredi za zabavo.

seg.quote: ...things that you do for fun in your spare time.
You don't come to work just for the fun of it.

sense.def:
To make fun of someone or something
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj dražiti ali se o njem šaliti.

seg.quote: Don't make fun of my father.
